pma:database.name: evenquiz
pma:database.pma:table: CREATE TABLE `evenquizquestions` ( `ID` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `question` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `answer` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `option1` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `option2` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `option3` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `imgName` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`ID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;

CREATE TABLE `evenquizstats` ( `userID` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `question` int(11) NOT NULL, `correctAnswers` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`userID`), KEY `question` (`question`), CONSTRAINT `evenquizstats_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`userID`) REFERENCES `users` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `evenquizstats_ibfk_2` FOREIGN KEY (`question`) REFERENCES `evenquizquestions` (`ID`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;

CREATE TABLE `polishcowmilkerstats` ( `userID` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `milk` int(11) NOT NULL, `milkers` int(11) NOT NULL, `slaves` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`userID`), CONSTRAINT `polishcowmilkerstats_ibfk_1` FOREIGN KEY (`userID`) REFERENCES `users` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;

CREATE TABLE `users` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `username` varchar(255) NOT NULL, `password` char(97) NOT NULL, `email` varchar(255) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;
